Subject: Can't test Mailsettings because of nonconfigured Proxy?
Description:
Hi,

i want to test our E-Mail Server Settings but when i click on test i got an error message that the IP and Port cant be null in the Proxy settings?

i also tried to change the Proxy settings to $something but after switching back to Proxy Type "none" the field is cleared

so how can i trigger an email test from the system settings?
Solution_Comment__c: Customer needed to configure their Firewall.  Email Alerts starting working after configuration was made.
